Package gate.creole.boilerpipe

This package contains a GATE PR for doing content detection via the boilerpipe library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoilerPipe
    A GATE PR which uses the boilerpipe library to determine which sections of a document are useful content and which are simply boilerplate.
    PositionedTextBlock
    An instance of TextBlock that stores positional information allowing GATE annotations to be created to cover the same text spans.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Behaviour
    An enum to describe how to interpret the set of mime types being processed by the processing resource.
    Extractor
    An enum describing the different content extraction algorithms that are available.

Package gate.creole.boilerpipe Description

This package contains a GATE PR for doing content detection via the boilerpipe library.
Author:
Mark A. Greenwood
